articles.author: Chris Fedor, cleveland.com
articles.title: Cavs suffer first loss of NBA playoffs, 121-112, to surgical Indiana Pacers - Cleveland.com
articles.description: The Cavs lost their first game of the NBA playoffs to the Indiana Pacers on Sunday night, 121-112, inside a stunned Rocket Arena.
articles.content:
CLEVELAND, Ohio The road to the conference finals no longer goes through Cleveland. 
The top-seeded Cavs lost their first game of the NBA playoffs to the fourth-seeded Indiana Pacers on Sunday night… [+4076 chars]
